entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:40 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
